component.name: ClownMapEd
component.summary: Sprite editor for the Mega Drive Sonic the Hedgehog games

description.p: A sprite editor for Sonic 1, Sonic 2, Sonic 3, and Sonic & Knuckles, intended to provide a free software, multiplatform drop-in replacement for SonMapEd. It is able to modify tiles, palettes, sprite mappings, and dynamic pattern load cues (DPLCs).
